00031 
00032 #include "../common/common.h"
00033 #include "../common/dei.h"
00034 
00035 using namespace std;
00036 
00038 struct clargs {
00039   Path command;               
00040   DEIoptions deiopt;          
00041   Path minus_name;            
00042   Path plus_name;             
00043   Path ref_name;              
00044   Path abs_name;              
00045   bool beverbose;                               
00046   bool SaveInt;                                 
00047 
00049   clargs(int argc, char *argv[]);
00050 };
00051 
00052 
00053 clargs::
00054 clargs(int argc, char *argv[]) :
00055   beverbose(false),
00056   SaveInt(false)
00057 {
00058 
00059   poptmx::OptionTable table
00060         ("DEI contrast processing.",
00061          "Takes two images recorded in different positions of the analyzing"
00062          " crystal and process them with the DEI method separating the"
00063          " apparent absorption and clean refraction components and saving"
00064          " the requested one(s).");
00065 
00066   table
00067         .add(poptmx::NOTE, "ARGUMENTS:")
00068         .add(poptmx::ARGUMENT, &minus_name, "minus",
00069                  "Contrast in the minus position.", "")
00070         .add(poptmx::ARGUMENT, &plus_name, "plus",
00071          "Contrast in the plus position.", "")
00072         .add(poptmx::NOTE, "",
00073                  table.desc(&minus_name) + ", " + table.desc(&plus_name) +
00074                  ". " + "Two images recorded in different position"
00075                  " of the analyzing crystal. Must be of equal sizes.")
00076 
00077         .add(poptmx::NOTE, "OPTIONS:")
00078         .add(poptmx::OPTION, &ref_name,'r', "refraction",
00079                  "Image name to output refraction component.", "", "NONE")
00080         .add(poptmx::OPTION, &abs_name,'a', "absorption",
00081                  "Image name to output absorption component.", "", "NONE")
00082         .add(poptmx::OPTION, &SaveInt,'i', "int",
00083       "Output image(s) as integer.", IntOptionDesc)
00084         .add(deiopt.options())
00085         .add_standard_options(&beverbose)
00086         .add(poptmx::MAN, "SEE ALSO:", SeeAlsoList);
00087 
00088   if ( ! table.parse(argc,argv) )
00089         exit(0);
00090   if ( ! table.count() ) {
00091         table.usage();
00092         exit(0);
00093   }
00094 
00095   command = table.name();
00096 
00097   // <minus> and <plus> : required arguments.
00098   if ( ! table.count(&minus_name) )
00099     exit_on_error(command, string () +
00100                                   "Missing required argument: "+table.desc(&minus_name)+".");
00101   if ( ! table.count(&plus_name) )
00102     exit_on_error(command, string () +
00103                                   "Missing required argument: "+table.desc(&plus_name)+".");
00104   // At least one of two options required
00105   if ( ! table.count(&abs_name) &&  ! table.count(&ref_name) )
00106     exit_on_error(command, string() +
00107                                   "At least one of two options must be set: " +
00108                                   table.desc(&ref_name) + table.desc(&abs_name) + ".");
00109 
00110 
00111 }
00112 
00113 
00115 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00116 
00117   const clargs args(argc, argv);
00118   const DEIprocess proc(args.deiopt.Gm, args.deiopt.Gp, args.deiopt.Rm, args.deiopt.Rp);
00119 
00120   Map ma, pa;
00121   ReadImage(args.minus_name, ma);
00122   ReadImage(args.plus_name, pa);
00123   if ( ma.shape() != pa.shape() )
00124     exit_on_error(args.command, "Geometry of the minus and plus"
00125                   " images do not match." );
00126 
00127   Map compa(ma.shape());
00128   if ( ! args.ref_name.empty() ) {
00129     compa = proc.extract(ma,pa,DEIprocess::REF);
00130     SaveImage(args.ref_name, compa, args.SaveInt);
00131   }
00132   if ( ! args.abs_name.empty() ) {
00133     compa = proc.extract(ma,pa,DEIprocess::ABS);
00134     SaveImage(args.abs_name, compa, args.SaveInt);
00135   }
00136 
00137   exit(0);
00138 
00139 }
